titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Jarrod Anderson Drawings MSS.474
titlestmt.author: Stacey Flatt

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-21 15:13:28 -0500.

physdesc.extent: in 1 folder in shared oversize flat box

did.abstract: Jarrod Anderson is an artist/illustrator. He graduated from Ringling School of Art and Design in 2003. Anderson was the illustrator for The Weaklings (2008), written by Dennis Cooper. He has also exhibited his artwork in various galleries. Anderson's collection consists of nine very fine line graphite drawings, with a similar look to etching. Works were executed in 2006, 2007, and some undated. Subjects consist of human figures, everyday objects, and vignettes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of nine drawings by artist/illustrator Jarrod Anderson, executed between 2006-2007. The works are very fine line drawings in graphite, with a similar look to etching. Subjects consist of human figures, every day objects, and vignettes.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Jarrod Anderson is an artist/illustrator. He graduated from Ringling School of Art and Design in 2003. Anderson was the illustrator for The Weaklings (2008), written by Dennis Cooper. He has also exhibited his artwork in various galleries.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: NYU's Fales Library & Special Collections is not the copyright owner for this collection. Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Researchers wishing to reproduce collection material should contact rights holders for permission.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Jarrod Anderson in 2017; the accession number associated with this gift if 2017.009.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Jarrod Anderson Drawings; MSS 474; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning, materials were moved into archival housing and described on the collection level.
